TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed beforefieldinit PostBackOptions extends System.Object

summary.span: 指定用戶端 JavaScript 的產生方式，以啟始回傳事件。

span.span: Specifies how client-side JavaScript is generated to initiate a postback event.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 類別可讓發出啟始回傳事件的用戶端指令碼的控制項。The class allows controls to emit client-side script that initiates a postback event. 類別也提供啟始回傳事件透過控制項的參考屬性。The class also provides a reference to the control that initiated the postback event through the property. 根據指定的選項建立回傳事件物件傳遞至方法。The postback event is created based on the options specified in the object passed in to the method. 通常，項目，例如送出按鈕或影像按鈕起始回傳至伺服器。Normally, a postback to the server is initiated by elements such as a Submit button or an Image button. 不過，所發出的用戶端 JavaScript 中，不同的控制項可以起始回傳事件。However, by emitting client-side JavaScript, different controls can initiate a postback event. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例使用事件要產生的用戶端指令碼控制項控制項，可讓控制項造成回傳事件。The following code example uses the event of a control to generate client-side script for a control that will allow the control to cause a postback event. 因為屬性`myPostBackOptions`物件設定為"Page2.aspx 」、 回傳會公佈到名為"Page2.aspx"，不提供以下的另一個頁面的 Web Form 網頁。Because the property of the `myPostBackOptions` object is set to "Page2.aspx", the postback will post the Web Forms page to another page named "Page2.aspx", which is not provided here. 若要使用此範例中，您必須加入至專案或目錄名稱為"Page2.aspx"的另一個網頁。To use this example, you must add another Web page named "Page2.aspx" to your project or directory. [!code-csharp[System.Web.UI.PostBackOptions#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.PostBackOptions/CS/postbackoptions.aspx.cs#2)] [!code-vb[System.Web.UI.PostBackOptions#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.PostBackOptions/VB/postbackoptions.aspx.vb#2)] 下列程式碼範例是一個網頁，可以用來執行上述程式碼後置檔案。The following code example is a Web page that can be used to run the preceding code-behind file. [!code-aspx-csharp[System.Web.UI.PostBackOptions#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.PostBackOptions/CS/postbackoptions.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[System.Web.UI.PostBackOptions#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.PostBackOptions/VB/postbackoptions.aspx#1)]

MemberSignature.Value: public: property System::String ^ ActionUrl { System::String ^ get(); void set(System::String ^ value); };

summary.span: 取得或設定 Web Form 網頁回傳的目標 URL。

span.span: Gets or sets the target URL for the postback of a Web Forms page.

value.span: Web Form 網頁回傳的 URL。

span.span: The URL for the postback of a Web Forms page.
The default value is an empty string ("").

remarks.format: ## Remarks 屬性類別指定的 URL `action` Web Form 網頁的屬性。The property of the class specifies the URL for the `action` attribute of a Web Forms page. 屬性可以用來指定 Web Form 頁面的回傳資料給，導致跨網頁回傳。The property can be used to specify which Web Forms page to post data back to, causing a cross-page post. 如需有關跨網頁公佈的詳細資訊，請參閱[跨網頁張貼在 ASP.NET Web Form](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/fedf234e-b7c4-4644-a9e8-c1c0870b043b)。For more information on cross-page posting, see [Cross-Page Posting in ASP.NET Web Forms](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/fedf234e-b7c4-4644-a9e8-c1c0870b043b). ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用屬性物件會造成跨網頁回傳如果使用者將滑鼠指標在控制項。The following code example demonstrates using the property of a object to cause a cross-page postback if a user positions the mouse pointer on a control. [!code-aspx-csharp[System.Web.UI.PostBackOptions.ActionUrl#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.PostBackOptions.ActionUrl/CS/postbackoptions.actionurlcs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[System.Web.UI.PostBackOptions.ActionUrl#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.PostBackOptions.ActionUrl/VB/postbackoptions.actionurlvb.aspx#1)]

MemberSignature.Value: public: property System::String ^ Argument { System::String ^ get(); void set(System::String ^ value); };

summary.span: 取得或設定回傳事件中所傳輸的選擇性引數。

span.span: Gets or sets an optional argument that is transferred in the postback event.

value.span: 在回傳事件中所傳輸的選擇性引數。

span.span: The optional argument that is transferred in the postback event.
The default value is an empty string ("").

remarks.format: ## Remarks 屬性會指定選擇性引數傳送的回傳事件中。The property specifies an optional argument that is transferred in a postback event. 這個屬性用來代表`EVENTARGUMENT`參數 _`doPostBack`的用戶端 JavaScript 方法。This property is used to represent the `EVENTARGUMENT` parameter of the _`doPostBack` method of the client-side JavaScript.

MemberSignature.Value: public: property bool AutoPostBack { bool get(); void set(bool value); };

summary.span: 取得或設定值，指出表單是否會自動回傳至伺服器以回應使用者動作。

span.span: Gets or sets a value that indicates whether the form will automatically post back to the server in response to a user action.

value.span: 如果表單會自動回傳以回應使用者動作，則為 ，否則為 。

span.span: if the form will automatically post back in response to a user action; otherwise, .
The default value is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 您可以使用屬性以表示 Web Form 網頁是否應該自動回傳至伺服器，以回應使用者動作，例如從下拉式清單中選取項目。You can use the property to indicate that a Web Forms page should automatically post back to the server in response to a user action such as selecting an item from a drop-down list. JavaScript`setTimeout`方法搭配 _`doPostBack`方法，以確保使用者動作完成之前就會發生回傳。The JavaScript `setTimeout` method is used with the _`doPostBack` method to ensure that the user action completes before the postback occurs. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例會示範用戶端指令碼時產生屬性和屬性都設定為`true`。The following code example shows the client-side script that is generated when the property and the property are both set to `true`. ```vb javascript:setTimeout('__doPostBack('__Page','')', 0) ``` ```csharp javascript:setTimeout('__doPostBack('__Page','')', 0) ```

MemberSignature.Value: public: property bool ClientSubmit { bool get(); void set(bool value); };

summary.span: 取得或設定值，指出回傳事件是否應該從用戶端指令碼發生。

span.span: Gets or sets a value indicating whether the postback event should occur from client-side script.

value.span: 如果回傳事件應該從用戶端指令碼發生，則為 ，否則為 。

span.span: if the postback event should occur from client-side script; otherwise, .
The default value is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 屬性會指出從用戶端指令碼是否應該發生回傳事件。The property indicates whether the postback event should occur from client-side script. 如果您設定屬性`false`，則會不產生任何 JavaScript。If you set the property to `false`, then no JavaScript is generated. 您可以指派`false`至屬性，如果您想要呼叫`__doPostBack`方法自己。You might assign `false` to the property if you want to call the `__doPostBack` method yourself.

MemberSignature.Value: public: property bool PerformValidation { bool get(); void set(bool value); };

summary.span: 取得或設定值，指出回傳事件發生之前是否需要用戶端驗證。

span.span: Gets or sets a value indicating whether client-side validation is required before the postback event occurs.

value.span: 如果在回傳事件發生之前需要用戶端驗證，則為 ，否則為 。

span.span: if client-side validation is required before the postback event occurs; otherwise, .
The default value is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 屬性用來指定發生回傳事件之前，是否需要用戶端驗證。The property is used to specify whether client-side validation is required before the postback event can occur. 當值屬性設定為`true`，您也可以使用屬性，以指定的驗證需要的回傳事件發生之前的驗證群組名稱。When the value of the property is set to `true`, you can also use the property to specify the name of the validation group for which validation is required before the postback event occurs. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用和屬性，以確定兩個控制項有輸入在其中產生回傳事件之前的資訊。The following code example demonstrates using the and properties to ensure that two controls have information entered in them before the postback event is generated. `NameTextBox`和`AgeTextBox`控制項屬於`PersonalInfoGroup`驗證群組，但`StateTextBox`控制項不是。The `NameTextBox` and `AgeTextBox` controls are part of the `PersonalInfoGroup` validation group, but the `StateTextBox` control is not. 因此，使用者不必輸入中的任何資料`StateTextBox`控制產生回傳事件之前。Therefore, the user does not have to enter any data in the `StateTextBox` control before the postback event is generated. > [!IMPORTANT] > 這個範例有一個可接受使用者輸入的文字方塊，這可能會造成安全性威脅。This example has a text box that accepts user input, which is a potential security threat. 根據預設，ASP.NET Web 網頁會驗證使用者輸入未包含指令碼或 HTML 項目。By default, ASP.NET Web pages validate that user input does not include script or HTML elements. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱 [Script Exploits Overview](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/772c7312-211a-4eb3-8d6e-eec0aa1dcc07) (指令碼攻擊概觀)。For more information, see [Script Exploits Overview](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/772c7312-211a-4eb3-8d6e-eec0aa1dcc07). [!code-aspx-csharp[System.Web.UI.PostBackOptions.Validation#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.PostBackOptions.Validation/CS/postbackoptions.validationcs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[System.Web.UI.PostBackOptions.Validation#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.PostBackOptions.Validation/VB/postbackoptions.validationvb.aspx#1)]

MemberSignature.Value: public: property bool RequiresJavaScriptProtocol { bool get(); void set(bool value); };

summary.span: 取得或設定值，指出是否產生用戶端指令碼的 前置字元。

span.span: Gets or sets a value indicating whether the prefix is generated for the client-side script.

value.span: 如果會產生用戶端指令碼的 前置字元，則為 ，否則為 。

span.span: if the prefix is generated for the client-side script; otherwise, .
The default value is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks `javascript:`例如前置詞需要具有一些 HTML 屬性`href`屬性``可以區別 URL 中的 JavaScript 屬性的標記。The `javascript:` prefix is needed with some HTML attributes such as the `href` attribute of the `` tag to distinguish a JavaScript property from a URL. 屬性類似`onclick`不需要`javascript:`前置詞，因為它會自動關聯於 JavaScript。An attribute like `onclick` does not need the `javascript:` prefix because it is automatically associated with JavaScript.

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property TargetControl As Control
public: property System::Web::UI::Control ^ TargetControl { System::Web::UI::Control ^ get(); };

summary.span: 取得會接收回傳事件的目標控制項。

span.span: Gets the control target that receives the postback event.

value.span: ，表示會接收回傳事件的控制項。

span.span: A that represents the control that receives the postback event.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 屬性會傳回物件，代表接收回傳事件的控制項。The property returns a object that represents the control that receives the postback event. 這個屬性被當做`EVENTTARGET`參數`__doPostBack`的用戶端 JavaScript 方法。This property is passed as the `EVENTTARGET` parameter to the `__doPostBack` method of the client-side JavaScript.

MemberSignature.Value: public: property bool TrackFocus { bool get(); void set(bool value); };

summary.span: 取得或設定值，指出回傳事件是否應該將頁面傳回至目前捲動位置，並將焦點傳回至目前的控制項。

span.span: Gets or sets a value indicating whether the postback event should return the page to the current scroll position and return focus to the current control.

value.span: 如果回傳事件應該將頁面傳回至目前捲動位置，並將焦點傳回至目標控制項，則為 ，否則為 。

span.span: if the postback event should return the page to the current scroll position and return focus to the target control; otherwise, .
The default value is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 屬性表示回傳事件是否應該將網頁傳回給目前的捲動位置，並在焦點還給控制項之後發生回傳事件。The property indicates whether the postback event should return the page to the current scroll position and return focus to the control after the postback event has occurred.

MemberSignature.Value: public: property System::String ^ ValidationGroup { System::String ^ get(); void set(System::String ^ value); };

summary.span: 取得或設定控制項群組， 物件會在回傳至伺服器時，針對這個群組引發驗證。

span.span: Gets or sets the group of controls for which the object causes validation when it posts back to the server.

value.span: 物件的控制項群組，會在回傳至伺服器時，針對這個群組引發驗證。

span.span: The group of controls for which the object causes validation when it posts back to the server.
The default value is an empty string ("").

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用屬性來指定驗證回傳事件產生時的驗證群組。Use the property to specify the validation group to validate when a postback event is generated. 只有指定的驗證群組中的驗證控制項進行驗證。Only the validation controls in the specified validation group are validated. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用和屬性，以確定兩個控制項有輸入在其中產生回傳事件之前的資訊。The following code example demonstrates using the and properties to ensure that two controls have information entered in them before the postback event is generated. `NameTextBox`和`AgeTextBox`控制項屬於`PersonalInfoGroup`驗證群組，但`StateTextBox`控制項不是。The `NameTextBox` and `AgeTextBox` controls are part of the `PersonalInfoGroup` validation group, but the `StateTextBox` control is not. 因此，使用者不必輸入中的任何資料`StateTextBox`控制產生回傳事件之前。Therefore, the user does not have to enter any data in the `StateTextBox` control before the postback event is generated. > [!IMPORTANT] > 這個範例有一個可接受使用者輸入的文字方塊，這可能會造成安全性威脅。This example has a text box that accepts user input, which is a potential security threat. 根據預設，ASP.NET Web 網頁會驗證使用者輸入未包含指令碼或 HTML 項目。By default, ASP.NET Web pages validate that user input does not include script or HTML elements. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱 [Script Exploits Overview](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/772c7312-211a-4eb3-8d6e-eec0aa1dcc07) (指令碼攻擊概觀)。For more information, see [Script Exploits Overview](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/772c7312-211a-4eb3-8d6e-eec0aa1dcc07). [!code-aspx-csharp[System.Web.UI.PostBackOptions.Validation#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.PostBackOptions.Validation/CS/postbackoptions.validationcs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[System.Web.UI.PostBackOptions.Validation#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.PostBackOptions.Validation/VB/postbackoptions.validationvb.aspx#1)]
